snippet: A number of recent deals offer a variation on the takeunder theme: takeovers for less than the initial public offering price. Avis, for example, is buying Zipcar at a 32 percent discount from the I.P.O.
abstract: A number of recent deals offer a variation on the takeunder theme: takeovers for less than the initial public offering price. Avis, for example, is buying Zipcar at a 32 percent discount from the I.P.O.

headline.main: Long After the I.P.O., Deals at a Discount
